original_text: So I did what the Lord had told me to do. I carried out a bag of my things to show that I was going on a journey. I prepared these things during the day. Then in the evening I used my hands to dig a hole in the wall of my house. When it became dark, I went out. I carried my bag of things on my shoulder. The people watched me do all this.
korean_text: 내가 그 명령대로 행하여 낮에 나의 행장을 끌려가는 포로의 행장 같이 내놓고 저물 때에 내 손으로 성벽을 뚫고 캄캄할 때에 행장을 내다가 그들의 목전에서 어깨에 메고 나가니라

sentences.original_text: So I did what the Lord had told me to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 주께서 나에게 하라고 하신 것을 행했다.

sentences.original_text: I carried out a bag of my things
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 물건들이 담긴 가방을 꺼냈다.

sentences.original_text: to show that I was going on a journey.
I prepared these things during the day.
I used my hands to dig a hole in the wall of my house.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 손으로 내 집 벽에 구멍을 파다.

sentences.original_text: When it became dark, I went out.
I carried my bag of things on my shoulder.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 물건 가방을 어깨에 메고 있었다.

sentences.original_text: The people watched me do all this.
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들이 나의 이 모든 행동을 지켜보았다.
